## NoPagingInitializerComponent class

Component used for rendering no paging initializer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NoPagingInitializerComponent implements NoPagingInitializer, GridPluginGeneric<NoPagingInitializerOptions> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [gridPlugins](./grid.nopaginginitializercomponent.gridplugins.md) |  | <code>GridPluginInstances</code> | Grid plugin instances available for this plugin |
|  [options](./grid.nopaginginitializercomponent.options.md) |  | <code>NoPagingInitializerOptions</code> | Options for grid plugin |
|  [pluginElement](./grid.nopaginginitializercomponent.pluginelement.md) |  | <code>ElementRef</code> | Element that represents plugin |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getItemsPerPage()](./grid.nopaginginitializercomponent.getitemsperpage.md) |  | Gets initial items per page |
|  [getPage()](./grid.nopaginginitializercomponent.getpage.md) |  | Gets initial page |
|  [initialize()](./grid.nopaginginitializercomponent.initialize.md) |  | Initialize plugin, to be ready to use, initialize communication with other plugins |
|  [initOptions()](./grid.nopaginginitializercomponent.initoptions.md) |  | Initialize plugin options, all operations required to be done with plugin options are handled here |
|  [invalidateVisuals()](./grid.nopaginginitializercomponent.invalidatevisuals.md) |  | Explicitly runs invalidation of content (change detection) |
|  [setItemsPerPage()](./grid.nopaginginitializercomponent.setitemsperpage.md) |  | Sets current items per page when changed |
|  [setPage()](./grid.nopaginginitializercomponent.setpage.md) |  | Sets current page when changed |
